revised_title: Reevaluating the Site and Origin of Graham's Island
tldr: The author, W. H. Smyth, conducted observations to determine the site and origin of Graham's Island. He found that the assigned location of the shoal was incorrect and that the island was not formed by the lifting of a shoal. The author also discussed the Adventure Bank and its depth, as well as the possibility of a temporary subaqueous volcanic eruption.
